pageOptions.headline: SwankVibe Privacy Policy
pageOptions.subHeading: We will not, without your permission, sell, publish or share information you entrust to us that identifies you or any person.

moreInfo: Email and other contact information you use to communicate. Only with your permission.
Current location used to find local style and fashion trends. Only with your permission.

collected.why: To display your fashion posts to other users.
moreInfo: Images you submit with your fashion posts.
Credit, bank, tax, and other financial data you use to stay productive. Only with your permission.
Biometrics includes your physical information such as fingerprints, facial recognition, signatures, and voice.
Browser history is a list of websites you visit.
Phone or text logs are calls or texts you make or receive.
Health, medical, or therapy information includes your health claims and information you use to measure health and wellness.
We share information with government entities only when required by law or expressly permitted in an emergency.

notShared.why: We do not share your personal information with them.
We do not share your personal information with them.
moreInfo: Ad networks display ads to you through apps.

notShared.why: We do not share your personal information with them.
moreInfo: Consumer data resellers sell consumer information to other companies for multiple purposes.

notShared.why: We do not share your personal information with them.
moreInfo: Data analytics providers collect and analyze your data.

notShared.why: We do not share your personal information with them.
moreInfo: Operating systems and platforms are companies that power devices and app stores.

notShared.why: We do not share your personal information with them.
moreInfo: Other apps are apps are other companies you may not currently interact with.

notShared.why: We do not share your personal information with them.
moreInfo: Social networks are companies that connect individuals around common interests and facilitate sharing.
